channel.title: üè¢ Nanyang Technological University on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in üè¢ Nanyang Technological University on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Beware of Road Markings: A New Adversarial Patch Attack to Monocular Depth Estimation
item.description: Researchers developed AdvRM, a new adversarial patch attack against monocular depth estimation models, which effectively camouflages patches as road markings to mislead depth predictions for any obsta…

item.title: ContextGS : Compact 3D Gaussian Splatting with Anchor Level Context Model
item.description: ContextGS: Revolutionizing 3D scene compression with an anchor-level autoregressive model, achieving 15x size reduction in 3D Gaussian Splatting while boosting rendering quality.

item.title: Distributed-Order Fractional Graph Operating Network
item.description: DRAGON: A novel GNN framework using distributed-order fractional calculus surpasses traditional methods by capturing complex graph dynamics with enhanced flexibility and performance.

item.title: Generalizable Implicit Motion Modeling for Video Frame Interpolation
item.description: Generalizable Implicit Motion Modeling (GIMM) revolutionizes video frame interpolation by accurately predicting optical flows at any timestep, surpassing existing methods and achieving state-of-the-ar…

item.title: Historical Test-time Prompt Tuning for Vision Foundation Models
item.description: HisTPT: Historical Test-Time Prompt Tuning memorizes past learning, enabling robust online prompt adaptation for vision models, overcoming performance degradation in continuously changing data streams…

item.title: Hybrid Mamba for Few-Shot Segmentation
item.description: Hybrid Mamba Network (HMNet) boosts few-shot segmentation accuracy by efficiently fusing support and query features using a novel hybrid Mamba architecture, significantly outperforming current state-o…

item.title: Learning 3D Garment Animation from Trajectories of A Piece of Cloth
item.description: Animates diverse garments realistically from a single cloth’s trajectory using a disentangled learning approach and Energy Unit Network (EUNet).

item.title: Learning to Handle Complex Constraints for Vehicle Routing Problems
item.description: Proactive Infeasibility Prevention (PIP) framework significantly improves neural methods for solving complex Vehicle Routing Problems by proactively preventing infeasible solutions and enhancing const…

item.title: Mitigating Object Hallucination via Concentric Causal Attention
item.description: Concentric Causal Attention (CCA) significantly reduces object hallucination in LVLMs by cleverly reorganizing visual tokens to mitigate the impact of long-term decay in Rotary Position Encoding.

item.title: MVGamba: Unify 3D Content Generation as State Space Sequence Modeling
item.description: MVGamba: A unified, feed-forward 3D content generation model achieving state-of-the-art quality and speed using an RNN-like state space model for efficient multi-view Gaussian reconstruction.

item.title: Open-Vocabulary Object Detection via Language Hierarchy
item.description: Language Hierarchical Self-training (LHST) enhances weakly-supervised object detection by integrating language hierarchy, mitigating label mismatch, and improving generalization across diverse dataset…

item.title: Robust Fine-tuning of Zero-shot Models via Variance Reduction
item.description: Variance Reduction Fine-tuning (VRF) simultaneously boosts in-distribution and out-of-distribution accuracy in fine-tuned zero-shot models, overcoming the ID-OOD trade-off.

item.title: Transferable Adversarial Attacks on SAM and Its Downstream Models
item.description: UMI-GRAT: A universal meta-initialized and gradient robust adversarial attack effectively exploits vulnerabilities in the Segment Anything Model (SAM) and its fine-tuned downstream models, even withou…
